jobTitle: Deep Learning Software (TensorRT) - New College Grad
jobDescription: We are now looking for Deep Learning Software Engineers (New College Grads) to join our TensorRT team: Today, research in Artificial Intelligence is booming worldwide, and NVIDIA is in a rare position to make a positive impact on the field with its GPU technology and software tools. Extraordinary tools like TensorRT play a significant role in proliferating use of Deep Learning to solve problems in a diverse set of domains.  As an Engineer on our TensorRT team, you will create impact in the world of Artificial Intelligence, especially in the hyper-scale data center, embedded and automotive product platforms markets. The position offers you a rare chance to work on high-performance neural network inference engines for a broad range of AI/Deep Learning applications like object detection, text processing, video analytics and more. Join the team which is building software which will be used by the entire world!
